name: eldifsnneq
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), wn(wceq(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), wne(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), wn(wceq(c0, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdif(c1, csn(c2))), wne(c0, c2))

comment: An element of a difference with a singleton is not equal to the element of that singleton. Note that ` ( -. A e. { C } -> -. A = C ) ` need not hold if ` A ` is a proper class. (Contributed by BJ, 18-Mar-2023.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 1-Jun-2023.)
